actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to eliminate certain inequities in the payment of Veterans' pensions to disabled railroad workers.

summary.text: Stipulates that any portion of any annuity received by any veteran under the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 which is directly attributable to the spouse or child of such veteran shall be disregarded for the purpose of determining annual income for the payment of veterans' pensions. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 521)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to eliminate certain inequities in the payment of Veterans' pensions to disabled railroad workers.
